message: Let's be fair and avoid drawn-out negotiations. I take a slight majority to account for the diminishing value over time.
I appreciate your offer, but I think it's time we both got a bit more. This offer is more in line with the dwindling value of the money, but still leaves us both with a decent share.
Bob, your offer is tempting, but the time pressure is on me more than you. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers to find a compromise.
